name: Total Tag
description:
This game was made for the IGDA Chicago Retro Game Jam. I did the project solo to test my skills, and felt that it turned out pretty good!

Orgs: IDGA Chicago, DePaul JDE, Columbia AlphaLabs

The game is tag, first to 3 points wins. 

Controls:

Quit Game: Escape Key

Player 1:

Movement: WASD

Tag: Space Bar

Player 2:

Movement: Arrow Keys

Tag: Enter on Keypad

Resources:

Engine: Unity

Sound: BFXR

Music: BeepBox

Pixel Shader: World of Zero

Color Limiter Shader: Color Quantization

Art (Title and UI): Pyxel Edit
